summary.para: Compares the specified property value against the enumerated values in a list and returns the matching index.

param.name: propvarCmp
param.para: A reference to a structure that represents the property value.

param.name: pnIndex
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the index in the enumerated type list that matches the property value, if any.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the object at the specified index in the list.

param.name: itype
param.para: The index of the object in the list.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve through ppv, typically IID_IShellItem.

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns successfully, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. This is typically .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the condition at the specified index.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve.

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of elements in the list.

param.name: pctypes
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the number of list elements.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that enumerate the possible values for a property.
